Control Name: 2.3 Ensure that Azure Defender is set to On for Azure SQL database servers
Control Statement: Turning on Azure Defender enables threat detection for Azure SQL database servers, providing threat intelligence, anomaly detection, and behavior analytics in the Azure Security Center.
